sentences: Sudan, for the G-77/CHINA, and Belize, for AOSIS, highlighted the EGTT s reports providing a long-term framework for technology transfer discussions, and called for continuation of regional and international research programmes.

With Lesotho, for LDCs, they also welcomed progress on the NWP, saying the outcome will improve the ability of developing countries to undertake adaptation actions. SBSTA Chair Plume closed the session at 5:42 pm.
